overview: The Triumph is a powerful new documentary film about a prophecy unfolding right now, before our very eyes. From a tiny village in Bosnia-Herzegovina comes a warning to the world, and a message of hope. Does one woman really know mankind's future, as millions believe? Decide for yourself. Explore the mysteries and miracles of the Medjugorje apparitions in this stunning documentary that is filling theaters throughout the world.
title: The Triumph
